mapper.update: update bBoard set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_date=to_date(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd'), board_file=#{board_file} where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.insert: insert into bBoard (board_num, board_category, board_email, board_nickname, board_date, board_title, board_content, board_filename, board_filepath) values ((select NVL(MAX(board_num), 0) + 1 from bBoard), #{board_category}, #{board_email}, #{board_nickname}, to_date(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd'), #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from bBoard where board_num=#{board_num} and board_category=#{board_category}
mapper.update: update bBoard set board_readcnt = board_readcnt+1 where board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: select rownum board_no, b.* from (select * from bBoard where board_category=#{board_category} order by board_num) b order by board_no desc
